data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="EnvironmentAndSystemPropertySecretStore" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org.forgerock.openam.secrets.config.EnvironmentAndSystemPropertySecretStore"  i18nKey="serviceDescription"  resourceName="EnvironmentAndSystemPropertySecretStore"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/EnvironmentAndSystemPropertySecretStore" ><Global validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="format"  name="format"  order="100"  resourceName="format"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><ChoiceValues><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.PLAIN" >PLAIN</ChoiceValue><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.BASE64" >BASE64</ChoiceValue><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.ENCRYPTED_PLAIN" >ENCRYPTED_PLAIN</ChoiceValue><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.ENCRYPTED_BASE64" >ENCRYPTED_BASE64</ChoiceValue><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.ENCRYPTED_HMAC_KEY" >ENCRYPTED_HMAC_KEY</ChoiceValue><ChoiceValue i18nKey="format.BASE64_HMAC_KEY" >BASE64_HMAC_KEY</ChoiceValue></ChoiceValues><DefaultValues><Value>BASE64</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></Global></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
